title: freebsd - recovery email is not being saved
body:
in personal settings, entering a recovery email address does not seem to work.

symptoms: 
- after entering an email address, hitting enter an reloading the page, the recovery email address is empty again
- the mozilla sync service does not find an email address
- there is no email in the owncloud database (mysql in my case) at least not in the table where i would expect it (oc_preferences)

check:
- it does not work with a fresh install using sqlite either

system:
owncloud-5.0.4

freebsd 9.0 powerpc with ports (selection)
php53-5.3.22
apache22-2.2.23_4
sqlite3-3.7.14.1
mysql-server-5.1.68
and lots of others

- new stuff -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

added - browser

safari 6.0.3, mac osx 10.8.3

added - logs:

nothing in owncloud.log

/var/log/httpd-access.log


192.168.0.29 - rudhpo [13/apr/2013:18:40:37 +0200] "get /owncloud/status.php http/1.1" 200 75
192.168.0.29 - - [13/apr/2013:18:40:37 +0200] "propfind /owncloud/remote.php/webdav/clientsync http/1.1" 401 291
192.168.0.29 - rudhpo [13/apr/2013:18:40:37 +0200] "propfind /owncloud/remote.php/webdav/clientsync http/1.1" 207 6934
